help.Title: Using System Variables
help.Subtitle: Simple System Variables for Dynamic Queries
help.Subtext: Below are examples of what you can use
help.Helptext:
{STRING}
Select * from tb_users where firstname = '{STRING}'; This will generate a random String between 6 and 8 characters in length.
{INT}
Select * from tb_users where id = {INT}; This will generate a random Integer between 1 and 51.
{i}
Select * from tb_users where id = {i}; This will generate a number that is in line with the loop number.
{bruteforce}
{bruteforce}; This will generate a bad login attempt from the user that is executing it.
